scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev && docker --context='<%= dockerContextDev %>' stack deploy -c dev.compose/docker-compose.yaml '<%= dockerStackDev %>' --with-registry-auth
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && docker --context='<%= dockerContextProd %>' stack deploy -c prod.compose/docker-compose.yaml '<%= dockerStackProd %>' --with-registry-auth
